title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:
florinciu left at 00:33 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
jvdrean joined #xwiki at 01:01  
jvdrean left #xwiki at 01:02  
rrodriguez left at 01:07 (Quit: rrodriguez  
sdumitriu - (01:13): I wonder why all the methods of the ActivityStreaPluginApi require programming rights  
lucaa left at 01:57 (Quit: Leaving.  
sburjan` - (02:48): sdumitriu: afaik no app should require PR  
sburjan` - (02:49): this was like a rule  
cjdelisle` - (02:49): ActivityStream is a plugin rather than an app but it is still odd that the requirement would be there in order to use it.  
sburjan` - (02:50): yesm, but IMO plugin is smaller than app ... so the rule enforces :)  
sburjan` - (02:53): bte, did you manage to fix the Watchlist/cron bug jerome reported ?  
cjdelisle` - (02:54): me?  
sburjan` - (02:55): not you.. devs in general :)  
sburjan` - (02:55): this wasn't a direct question  
sburjan` - (02:56): anywayz .. mighty night  
abusenius left at 03:18 (Ping timeout: 245 seconds  
mflorea joined #xwiki at 08:44  
rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 08:50  
rrodriguez left at 09:01 (Quit: rrodriguez  
fmancinelli joined #xwiki at 09:08  
lucaa joined #xwiki at 09:09  
lucaa left at 09:12 (Client Quit  
rrodriguez joined #xwiki at 09:12  
Enygma` joined #xwiki at 10:14  
SvenDowideit left at 10:25 (Ping timeout: 250 seconds  
SvenDowideit\_ joined #xwiki at 10:26  
lpereira joined #xwiki at 10:33  
mflorea left at 12:04 (Quit: Leaving.  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 12:57  
flaviusolaru joined #xwiki at 13:29  
abusenius joined #xwiki at 13:30  
flaviusolaru left at 13:58 (Quit: Leaving.  
jvelociter - (15:06): not good : myxwiki restart emails are now marked as spam in my mailbox :0  
jvelociter - (15:06): :)  
jvelociter - (15:07): sburjan`: yes Vincent fixed it  
vmassol - (15:08): guys is it normal that the wysiwyg editor allows to modify macro content now?  
vmassol - (15:08): (try on the home page for ex)  
vmassol - (15:09): it was much better before IMO  
vmassol - (15:10): ah no it's just not working on chroe  
jvelociter - (15:10): don't know. we need to ask Marius  
vmassol - (15:10): chrome  
vmassol - (15:12): jvelociter: yep, I've pinged marius. It's less important though since the pb is only on chrome. I thought it was a regression but maybe not  
vmassol - (15:30): any more feedback on the 2.6 release?  
vmassol - (15:31): should I continue the release or wait a bit more?  
vmassol - (15:44): myxwiki.org keeps restarting all the time....  
vmassol - (15:44): any idea?  
vmassol - (15:44): http://myxwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Admin/ShowLog doesn't work anymore for some reason  
jvelociter left at 15:46 (Remote host closed the connection  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 15:47  
florinciu joined #xwiki at 15:56  
mflorea joined #xwiki at 16:24  
jbrBridge - (16:32): [dirk] where can I find a document about the xwiki 2.1 syntax ?  
jbrBridge - (17:27): [dirk] Hi - i have  a document which I cant access, delete ...  
jbrBridge - (17:27): [dirk] Document name: "++++TemplateSkriptDokumentation+"  
jbrBridge - (17:27): [dirk] I think the '+' makes the troubles, but I don't know how the get in the page name. :-/  
jbrBridge - (17:27): [dirk] Can I delete or rename the page. The tomcat process starts to consume a huge amount of cpu.  
jbrBridge - (17:27): [dirk]  
jbrBridge - (17:27): [dirk] Is there a way to delete this page from the database?  
jvelociter - (17:31): vmassol: you receive the restart emails right ?  
jvelociter - (17:33): looks like there are lot of errors coming from the cinqtulipes wiki  
jvelociter\_ joined #xwiki at 17:42  
jvelociter left at 17:42 (Read error: Connection reset by peer  
jvelociter\_ is now known as jvelociter ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
vmassol - (18:12): jvelociter: yes  
vmassol - (18:12): (I receive them)  
vmassol - (18:12): dirk: we haven't documented it yet  
vmassol - (18:12): (the xwiki syntax 2.1)  
vmassol - (18:12): what we have right now is in the release notes  
lpereira left at 18:24 (Quit: Leaving.  
jbrBridge - (18:27): [dirk] I have in XWiki 2.5.1 something weird.  
jbrBridge - (18:29): [dirk] 1. Create a page in a multilingual wiki with a title and lang=en.  
jbrBridge - (18:29): [dirk] 2. Edit this page and remove the title and change the lang to e.g. de  
jbrBridge - (18:29): [dirk] Result: You have a stuck thread in tomcat and the page isn't accessible any more.  
jbrBridge - (18:29): [dirk] Can maybe somebody reproduce this ?  
jbrBridge - (18:38): [dirk] Sorry - i found the problem:  
jbrBridge - (18:38): [dirk] {{velocity}}$doc.getDisplayTitle(){{/velocity}}  
jbrBridge - (18:38): [dirk] I will create an issue  
mflorea left at 18:44 (Quit: Leaving.  
jbrBridge - (18:46): [dirk] XWIKI-5714  
vmassol - (18:58): dirk: thanks for the jira  
jbrBridge - (19:34): [dirk] Any hint:  
jbrBridge - (19:34): [dirk] The "tagcloud" macro is not in the list of registered macros. Verify the spelling or contact your administrator.  
jbrBridge - (19:34): [dirk] ?  
vmassol - (19:37): dirk: it's defined there: http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/TagCloud  
vmassol - (19:37): (as obejcts)  
vmassol - (19:37): you could check the visiblity and whether you have the correct rights  
vmassol - (19:38): dirk: just tested and it works for me. It's probably a rights issue you have or you have imported the XAR in a running wiki  
vmassol - (19:38): (we had issues with this pre 2.6)  
vmassol - (19:38): to ensure the macro is registered you can edit the page and save it  
vmassol - (19:38): it'll re-register it  
jbrBridge - (19:45): [dirk] Just upgraded to 2.5.1 - and the problem is only in one installation.  
jbrBridge - (19:45): [dirk] Saving TagCloud resolve the problem.  
jbrBridge - (19:45): [dirk] I also found: Unknown macro: spaces  
jbrBridge - (19:45): [dirk] Is there an easy way to check which macros are "lost" ?  
vmassol - (19:48): dirk: you can find registered macros on this page: http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/WikiMacros  
vmassol - (19:49): s/macros/wiki macros/  
vmassol - (19:49): it would be easy to report macro definitions for macros that are not registered  
rrodriguez left at 19:50 (Quit: rrodriguez  
vmassol - (19:50): fyi on my local install I have 3 wiki macros registered: tagcloud, spaces and activity  
jbrBridge - (19:51): [dirk] activity ? This I can't see here.  
vmassol - (19:51): it's in http://localhost:8080/xwiki/bin/view/Main/Activity  
vmassol - (19:51): you should have it normally since otherwise you home dashboard isn't going to work  
vmassol - (19:51): unless you've kept the old dashboard  
vmassol - (19:51): (the old Recent Changes one)  
jvelociter - (20:04): I think there is a performance issue with the new dashboard  
jvelociter - (20:05): locally, it takes between 4 and 6 seconds to display a page with the new activity dashboard (like home page or admin profile)  
jvelociter - (20:05): while all other pages are under 1 second  
jvelociter - (20:05): (I have imported 1000+ documents so I have created many activities entries)  
jvelociter - (20:05): we should look into it. It's blocker IMO since the home page should display blazing fast  
jvelociter - (20:07): (especially since 1000 activities is not that much)  
sdumitriu - (20:09): Yes, there is a performance issue with the activity macro  
sdumitriu - (20:10): Maybe some more indexes are needed  
jbrBridge - (20:10): [dirk] Main.Activity - is this a 2.6 page - i can't found it in the 2.5.1 xar.  
sdumitriu - (20:10): Yes, 2.6  
jvelociter - (20:10): guys what do you think we make colibri the defaultbaseskin now ?  
sdumitriu - (20:11): jvelociter: Not possible yet  
sdumitriu - (20:11): Since there are still some dependencies on albatross  
jvelociter - (20:11): ah ok  
sdumitriu - (20:11): I've been wanting to wead them out for a long time, but never got the time  
sdumitriu - (20:12): s/wead/weed  
sburjan` - (20:17): :)  
jvelociter - (20:19): sdumitriu: you know them all ?  
jvelociter - (20:19): maybe I can help if we have a list  
sburjan` - (20:20): I guess this will make the package a little bit smaller too  
sdumitriu - (20:20): No, one idea I had just now was to use a modified core to list all the times when an URL referencing albatross is used.  
sdumitriu - (20:21): And then run all the tests  
jvelociter - (20:26): yes that would be a good strategy. there is nothing obvious in any case.. I'm running colibri as default base skin, and so far everything looks good  
jbrBridge - (20:33): [dirk] Is there a way to have multilingual confirmation emails for the user registration ?  
sdumitriu - (20:36): dirk: Yes  
jbrBridge - (20:37): [dirk] o.k :-)  
jbrBridge - (20:37): [dirk] Do you have a link for me O:-)  
jbrBridge - (22:06): [dirk] Please have a look - this is really annoying : XE-757  
jvelociter\_ joined #xwiki at 22:21  
jvelociter left at 22:25 (Ping timeout: 250 seconds  
jvelociter\_ is now known as jvelociter ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
fmancinelli left at 22:47 (Ping timeout: 265 seconds  
Enygma` left at 22:53 (Ping timeout: 265 seconds  
jvelociter left at 22:54 (Remote host closed the connection  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 22:54  
jvelociter\_ joined #xwiki at 23:09  
jvelociter left at 23:12 (Ping timeout: 245 seconds  
jvelociter\_ is now known as jvelociter ([[email protected]](https://dev.xwiki.org/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)  
vmassol - (23:26): http://www.eclipse.org/mat/ is really cool  
vmassol - (23:26): just ran it on a local 2.6 XE  
vmassol - (23:26): sdumitriu: yahoo javascript compressor is using 22% of all memory  
vmassol - (23:26): (17MB of heap)  
vmassol - (23:28): and python PyDictionnary is the second one, takes 8MB (11.3%)  
cjdelisle` - (23:30): Wow 22% is bad.  
vmassol - (23:31): velocity runtime instance comes third with 6MB (7.79%)  
cjdelisle` - (23:31): I'd be +1 for dropping minification entirely. Let the user read the code even if it costs a bit more b/w.  
vmassol - (23:31): then hibernate session factory impl at 4.3MB (5.77%)  
vmassol - (23:32): http://tinycoke.com/\_6rt7pjrbk2Ko/screen\_shot\_2010-11-20\_at\_11.32.15\_pm.png  
vmassol - (23:33): (the first entry is the yahoo compressor)  
cjdelisle` - (23:35): Wonder if it's pulling in all of rhino.  
vmassol - (23:46): sdumitriu: maybe this can be fixed with the new url factory you've added recently: http://jira.xwiki.org/jira/browse/XABLOG-33 ? (note: I haven't checked if the issue is still there)  
vmassol left at 23:57 (Quit: Leaving.
